sentence: HUNTER BIDEN'S LAPTOP: EX-CIA OFFICER BUCK SEXTON RIPS FORMER COLLEAGUES' REFUSAL TO APOLOGIZE Biggs signed onto a March 21 letter with the House Judiciary Committee’s ranking member Rep. Jim Jordan, R-Ohio, and Rep. Mike Johnson, R-La., to FBI Director Christopher Wray requesting an unredacted copy of the report, documents referring to or relating to the audit, an explanation of whether the FBI resolved the matters and a description of the FBI’s predicate to open investigations into politicians, religious groups and others named in the audit.

title: House GOP pushes Wray for transparency on FBI misconduct in probing politicians, religious groups, journalists
